Interface RecipientSpecification

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnyDomainPostmaster, AnyDomainRecipient, AnyRecipient, CaseInsensitiveAnyDomainRecipient, DomainPostmasterSpecification, GlobalPostmasterSpecification, GlobalUsersRecipientSpecification, InlineRecipientRegistry, LocalPostmaster, LocalRecipientSpecification, LocalRemoteCombinedRecipientSpecification, RecipientSpecifications, RegexAddressSpecification
public interface RecipientSpecification

A RecipientSpecification defines a criteria and it is able to tell if a recipient matches it.
